collation.cr: # # Avagraha and Visarga are primary ignorables. # &ഃ<<ഽ # # Archaic and modern AU-Signs are different only by tertiary. # &ോ<ൗ &ൗ<<<ൌ # # Pre-5.1 Chillus secondary equal to 5.1 chillus. # Chillus primary equal to its consonant_dead form. # &ക്<<ക്‍ &ക്‍<<<ൿ &ണ്<<ണ്‍ &ണ്‍<<<ൺ &ന്<<ന്‍ &ന്‍<<<ൻ &ര്<<ര്‍ &ര്‍<<<ർ &ല്<<ല്‍ &ല്‍<<<ൽ &ള്<<ള്‍ &ള്‍<<<ൾ # # Anuswara primary equal to MA_dead. # &മ്<<ം # # /nta/ is sorted as <NA, Virama, RRA>. # &ന്<<<ൻ്
